title: Obama Funded China's COVID-Leaking Lab?!  | Ep #10 Good Morning MugClub
description: Did you hear the report that the Obama admin actually funded the bat coronavirus experiments at the Wuhan lab that probably leaked the virus? Do you think the U.S. has any business using taxpayer dollars to fund overseas research like this? We talk about Brian Stelter's on-air plea and Dan Crenshaw's decimation of Bill Maher, and Dr. Choi calls in to diagnose 1/4 Black Garrett's "condition."
itunes:author: Blaze Podcast Network
